summary: A woman wakes up in a river. Wounded and without memory, then races to elude mysterious followers and recover from amnesia.
cast: Tuva Novotny|Flemming Enevold|Carsten Bjørnlund|Arnaud Binard|John Buijsman|Rogier Philipoom|Jens Jørn Spottag|Marie Louise Wille|Françoise Lebrun|Koen Wouterse|Simon van Lammeren|Joe Toedtling|Finn Nielsen|Henrik Prip|Ann Hjort|Joen Bille|Slavo Bulatovic|Philippe Van Den Bergh|Jens Sætter-Lassen|Anne Kristine Bech|Lars Thiesgaard|Christina Mølgård|Hans Henrik Clemensen|Tara Uitterlinden|Ron Groenewoud|Marco Rollot|Pierre Lelieu|Hans Hoogendoorn|Kristoffer Meinert|Nordsjællands Symfoniorkester|Helle Pilar Larsen
title: ID:A
